name: Air fight: World War 2
description: Fly an English Hawker Hurricane or Spitfire aircraft and shoot down enemy planes. There are several levels in the game, where you will take part in air battles as a beginner, an experienced pilot and there is the most difficult level. Each air fighter is supplied with mighty cannon which can destroy the enemy during the few shots. You have to survive and avoid bullets from enemy warplanes and battleships. You have to shot down bombers, fighters.
